creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
OpenOffice.org 2.0 will be released in the next few weeks.
OpenOffice.org 2.0 will use the "Open Document Format for Office Applications
(OpenDocument)"

Relevant links:
http://openoffice.org/
http://xml.openoffice.org/
http://www.oasis-open.org/committees/tc_home.php?wg_abbrev=office

BTW: The current draft of OpenDocument 1.0 is 723 pages long ...

creator: michi@apache.org
text:
Lenya 1.4 has started OpenDocument integration. You might want to take a look
at the default publication document types samples.

Michi
OO2 integration is ok, see for OO3 for Lenya 3 : http://wiki.apache.org/lenya/Lenya%203.0
creator: florent.andre-dev@4sengines.com
